name: PRTs
description:
Play Pit the pirate and take your journey to the sea. Explore islands fight sea monsters and dig chests.

This game is made for the lowrezjam2016, with a reolution of 64x64 pixel and a palette of 4 colors.

The Game was inspired by Zelda's Wind Waker and Final Fantasy VIII's Chocobo World.

Hope you enjoy playing it :)
Thanks!


Controls:
Up, Down, Left, Right, A

Hint:
The compass in the upper right points to the nearest island
Enter ship by pressing left + right to rest and restore your HP

Known Issues:

  • Some browser may have problems playing the background music
  • Island disappered after dying on it
Credits:
Music: Ozzed (http://ozzed.net/) [Used under the creative common license]
Graphics & Game: Me (PixelPOW)
